__e: Really, they brought him up... but they want him to know you, his father.
Besides, it's time he knew his father.
But this has got to be a new record. I got dumped even before I find out his name!
How does everyone know you? You come once a year. You're the most popular person in town.

This hotel is one of the best I know, and I travel quite frequently. Not only is it very well located, but the staff is very available and the rooms are very original. We managed to get a room with a fantastic view over Notre Dame.
You're the realest man I ever met, and the kindest, and the tallest.
And I am the only living person who knows the truth.
I'd like to help her, but i can't... Till i know why she's frightened.
Just in case, I want to finish this with him, so... he knows how it ends.
Unless there's another one missing I don't know about.
There isn't one thought that crosses your mind that i'm not aware of.
The only person I don't know yet is you.
You're the only person I know who works.
Don't leave me. You're the only woman I know who can follow me.
I must say, you're the only man I ever heard of... who acts exactly like some poor girl that has to get married.
They need someone who knows the local rat holes.
Well, it would have to be someone he trusted someone who knew sign language.
